description:
Have you heard of "machine learning", and you're trying to figure out exactly what that means? I'll give you my definition, provide some examples of machine learning, and explain at a high level how machine learning "works".

This is the first video in the series, `Introduction to machine learning with scikit-learn <http://www.dataschool.io/machine-learning-with-scikit-learn/>`__. The notebook and resources shown in the video are available on `GitHub <https://github.com/justmarkham/scikit-learn-videos>`__.
title: What is machine learning, and how does it work?
